description: This file declares a namespace 'omi' containing a function 'ParseConfigJson' for parsing annotations in a JSON configuration related to dm-verity and dm-crypt. It includes licensing information, include guards, and documentation comments.

methods.name: ParseConfigJson
methods.description: Parses annotations in a JSON configuration payload, extracting roothash, hashoffset, and key for dm-verity and dm-crypt, returning 0 on success and -1 on failure.
